lead_paragraph: Barcelona's Nou Camp is the biggest soccer arena in Europe and has long been the home of the world's best players but visitors have often complained that it is lacking in atmosphere.

headline.print_headline: Barcelona Fans Turn Up the Noise at Nou Camp
headline.main: Barcelona Fans Turn Up the Noise at Nou Camp

snippet: Barcelona's Nou Camp is the biggest soccer arena in Europe and has long been the home of the world's best players but visitors have often complained that it is lacking in atmosphere....
